Description: Pottery fragment of Attic drinking cup, black on inside and outside of rim; below rim, carination row of leaves.
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 315)
Condition: not certain whether from Tell Dafana or Sparta - CHECK
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
